page.title: 09Housing in Crawford.
page.content: In Crawford there are council houses and private houses.Most of Coronation Drive is council houses and on Dunalastair Road there are two blocks of council flats.There are more privately owned houses in Crawford than council houses or flats. The other day in Crawford a house went on fire.Everything in the house was ruined.The fire started in the bedroom and carried on from there. The fire happened on the 21st May 1985.A house in the same place was burnt down ten years ago. There are two new houses being built in Crawford at the moment.Both of them are bungalows.One is nearly finished and the other has just got the frame up. The largest house in Crawford is the old manse.
